author: brian
msg: Fix two select bugs in http_main.

author: brian
msg: Add a bug noticed by Dean.  Hmm, probably not a showstopper for a 1.3.0 release though.

author: martin
msg: Suppress "error(0)" messages for ap_log_error() when the APLOG_NOERRNO
is unset (as it is in situations like timeouts) where it is unclear
whether errno is set or not. It is questionable whether the ap_log_error()
timeout calls in http_protocol should not have an APLOG_NOERRNO as well.
